RT‚ÄÇOllama
Ollama and @LangChainAI ü¶úworks well together!

In previous posts, @Hacubu from LangChain has built an example client-side app (all local) that allows you to chat over documents.

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: üå† Azure Cosmos DB Vectorstore üå† You can use @Azure Cosmos DB as a vectorstore in @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS community 0.0.10! It...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üå† Azure Cosmos DB Vectorstore üå†

You can use @Azure Cosmos DB as a vectorstore in @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS community 0.0.10!

It‚Äôs fully managed and MongoDB-compatible, letting you work with a familiar interface and dev experience.

Thanks @sinedied!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/vectorstores/azure_cosmosdb

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: ü§ó HuggingFace Chat Wrapper ü§ó You can now use @HuggingFace LLMs in @LangChainAI as chat models! Incredibly, the small Zephyr-7B can...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
ü§ó HuggingFace Chat Wrapper ü§ó

You can now use @HuggingFace LLMs in @LangChainAI as chat models!

Incredibly, the small Zephyr-7B can even power simple agent use-cases. only the most powerful frontier models could do this last year!

S/o @andrewrreed!

https://python.langchain.com/docs/integrations/chat/huggingface
item.author: LangChain

item.title: üíéAutomatic LLM Routing with `notdiamond-0001` notdiamond-0001 automatically determines whether to send queries to GPT-3.5 or GPT-4, depending on wh...
item.description:
üíéAutomatic LLM Routing with `notdiamond-0001`

notdiamond-0001 automatically determines whether to send queries to GPT-3.5 or GPT-4, depending on which model is best-suited for your task

Built by @tomas_hk, they trained notdiamond-0001 on hundreds of thousands of data points‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1738243031403540543

item.title: Good question We are running chat-langchain in production: https://github.com/langchain-ai/chat-langchain Includes an incremental ingest pipeline run ...
item.description:
Good question

We are running chat-langchain in production: https://github.com/langchain-ai/chat-langchain

Includes an incremental ingest pipeline run daily, citing of source quotes, returning retrieved documents, query transformation, chat memory, and streaming


Martin H√∏st Normark:‚ÄÇWhat are some great productized examples of RAG? @llama_index and @LangChainAI helps with the technical implementation, but there's a lot left on the table to onboard into a product, ingest knowledge, apply potentially different RAG strategies for knowledge bases etc.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Kristian Freeman: Ooh, neat -- @obsdmd document loader is in JS @LangChainAI -- loads Markdown and even parses YAML frontmatter üñºÔ∏è Quick script...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇKristian Freeman
Ooh, neat -- @obsdmd document loader is in JS @LangChainAI -- loads Markdown and even parses YAML frontmatter

üñºÔ∏è Quick script to load a local vault into Langchain documents. Next is plugging the docs into @Cloudflare Vectorize and querying via an LLM!

https://api.js.langchain.com/classes/langchain_document_loaders_fs_obsidian.ObsidianLoader.html

item.title: RT Roger Taylor: Leverage @LangChainAI's create_pandas_dataframe_agent() to build an AI assistant for effortless EDA, analysis & data visualization. N...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇRoger Taylor
Leverage @LangChainAI's create_pandas_dataframe_agent() to build an AI assistant for effortless EDA, analysis & data visualization.
Nagesh Mashette guides through querying dataframes in NL for efficient hypothesis testing & insights! https://medium.com/@nageshmashette32/automate-data-analysis-with-langchain-3c0d97dec356
#LLMs #NLP #DataViz

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇArsalan Ali

For now it seems alright.

Created a simplified version of the official notebook and used @LangChainAI to mostly interact with the Gemini models.

Notebook:
